About This Property
Welcome to this beautifully renovated single-family home on South Boston's east side! The house spans two floors and offers a perfect combination of modern upgrades and classic charm. 3 bedrooms with closets, 1.5 bath, Central A/C, washer/dryer, private backyard space. Walking distance to bars/restaurants & Carson Beach.
